description: List accounts visible in the directory.

request.name: offset
request.comment: Number. Skip the first n results.

request.name: limit
request.comment: Number. How many accounts to load. Defaults to 40 accounts. Max 80 accounts.

request.name: order
request.comment: String. Use active to sort by most recently posted statuses (default) or new to sort by most recently created profiles.

request.name: local
request.comment: Boolean. If true, returns only local accounts.
